name: SPHERE.IO Donut
description: Create your own webshop in minutes with SPHERE.IO and our template 'sphere-donut'

SPHERE_PROJECT_KEY.description: The project Key for your SPHERE.IO project.

SPHERE_CLIENT_ID.description: The clientId of your SPHERE.IO project.

SPHERE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The clientSecret of your SPHERE.IO project.

PACTAS_API_URL.description: The API URL you want to use at Pactas.

PACTAS_AUTH_URL.description: The Auth URL you want to use at Pactas.

PACTAS_CLIENT_ID.description: The clientId of your Pactas account.

SPHERE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The clientSecret of your Pactas account.
